title: Wasn't there supposed to be a New Client Beta?
body:
All the news for it suddenly disappeared.

My Client Alpha shortcut also suddenly disappeared.

I also haven't gotten any notifications in the old client about it.

So where did it go?

replies.body: If your icon disappeared, you're likely already in the process of updating to the Beta client. Launch into League using the shortcuts in your installation locale (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and let me know if you're still experiencing issues with this.

lol.launcher or LeagueClient?

Because lol.launcher takes me to the old client.

But LeagueClient takes me to the new client.
LeagueClient is the launcher for the new Beta Client, so that's the one!
